bio:
Mofizur Rahman (@moficodes) is a Senior Developer Advocate at Vonage. His favorite programming language these days is Go. He also tinkers with Node, Python and Java. He is also learning and teaching in the Go, Kubernetes, Docker and Microservice community. He is a strong believer of the power of open source and importance of giving back to the community. He is a self proclaimed sticker collecting addict and has collected several box full of stickers with no signs of stopping. He dabbles in photography sometimes. He loves board games and is the dedicated game master of the friend group.

He writes tech blogs sometimes which can be found on https://dev.to/moficodes.
name: Mofi Rahman
title: Senior Developer Advocate
